Uses of Package
co.cask.coopr.store.cluster

  • Packages that use co.cask.coopr.store.cluster 
    Package Description
    co.cask.coopr.scheduler.callback
    Hooks for adding custom logic before and after cluster operations.
    co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task
    Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs.
    co.cask.coopr.store.cluster
    Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
  • Classes in co.cask.coopr.store.cluster used by co.cask.coopr.scheduler.callback 
    Class and Description
    ClusterStoreService
    Service for getting a ClusterStoreView for different an account that will restrict what parts of the actual store can be viewed or edited.
  • Classes in co.cask.coopr.store.cluster used by co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task 
    Class and Description
    ClusterStoreService
    Service for getting a ClusterStoreView for different an account that will restrict what parts of the actual store can be viewed or edited.
  • Classes in co.cask.coopr.store.cluster used by co.cask.coopr.store.cluster 
    Class and Description
    BaseSQLClusterStoreView
    Base abstract class for ClusterStoreView using a SQL database as the persistent store.
    ClusterStore
    A full view of the cluster store for management purposes.
    ClusterStoreService
    Service for getting a ClusterStoreView for different an account that will restrict what parts of the actual store can be viewed or edited.
    ClusterStoreView
    A view of the cluster store as seen by a given account.
